Overview text: The Professional Certificate in Education (CLIL) will introduce teachers to the pedagogical issues that impinge on the success of content and integrated language learning (CLIL). Its focus is on the general pedagogical principles and practice entailed in teaching content through a second or foreign language, and an understanding of the linguistic, sociolinguistic, cultural and cross-cultural issues that impinge on the success of such courses.
